text: yes, you can use the V3 search api for that

at 6p everyday day I have to check all open tasks and send a summary email to a manager and a reminder with the # of open tasks to each user, How can I do this? as times goes buy there will be several thousands of completed tasks in the system so pulling ALL of them using `GET /engagements/v1/engagements/paged` to find the ones that are open doesnt make much sense. What i really need is a way to query open tasks by owner, any clue?
